Attribution:
TheDealCalc.com

Description:
Real estate investment calculators and underwriting tools. Free professional-grade analysis for rental properties, BRRRR deals, syndications, fix and flips, cap rate, cash-on-cash return, and Net Present Value (NPV). No signup required.

Calculators:
- Rental Property Calculator: Analyze buy-and-hold rental investments with cash flow, cap rate, cash-on-cash return, and IRR calculations
- BRRRR Calculator: Model Buy-Rehab-Rent-Refinance-Repeat strategies with cash-out projections
- Syndication Analyzer: LP/GP waterfall structures with preferred returns and promote calculations
- Fix and Flip Calculator: Calculate profit, ROI, and break-even on house flipping deals
- Cap Rate Calculator: Capitalization rate from Net Operating Income (NOI) and property value
- Cash-on-Cash Calculator: Return on invested capital with leverage analysis
- NPV Calculator: Net Present Value with multiple period frequencies and sensitivity analysis

Contact:
https://thedealcalc.com/contact
